org.iges.util
Class Bounds

java.lang.Object
  org.iges.util.Bounds
public class Bounds
extends java.lang.Object

This is actually a container for two similar classes, Bounds.Grid and Bounds.World. Both represent a 4-dimensional constraint (a dimension environment, in GrADS terms). The methods are similar in function, but take different primitive types as arguments Although there is no formal relationship between them, they are grouped together to emphasize their similarity.
